page.title: UPS to Hire 70,000 Workers for Holidays
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - United Parcel Service Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=UPS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">UPS.N</A>, the world's largest package delivery company, said on Tuesday it plans to hire nearly 70,000 temporary workers to help handle an estimated 340 million packages from Thanksgiving to Christmas, exceeding year-ago forecasts.
